name: PARADISE SHOOTING!!
description:
This is a casual shooting game in which players move your ship left and right and destroy all the targets on the screen with special bullets to clear the game.
Use "conventional ammunition" to destroy enemies that interfere with the destruction of the "target."

*"conventional ammunition" is fired automatically.
*To fire a "special bullet", hold down the SPACE key or click the left mouse button. Then release the button to fire!
*There are 12 stages in total. You will get 2 "Reward CG" for each stage you clear!
(The total number of "Reward CGs" will be 24.)


[Operation Explanation]
Move left : "A" or "left arrow" key
Move right : "D" or "right arrow" key
special bullet : Press and hold the "SPACE" key or left mouse button and release
Game Interruption : Press "BackSpace" key or the "II" button on the right side of the screen
